name: PlayTheCareerChallengesPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen in as experts from a wide variety of industries share their stories of lessons learned the hard way, overcoming professional hurdles, and how to convert them into a marketing message. The key is to create a business book and build your marketing message around it.
Your book will be your platform to expand your business, secure speaking gigs, market a new product or service, establish your authority, and connect with your ideal client.
The Career Challenges Podcast provides examples on a weekly basis. Each guest is your chance to learn something new in your professional journey and help you become a published author.
Start your publishing journey today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
